description: Describes the specified Verified Access groups.

parameters.name: VerifiedAccessGroupIds
parameters.description: The ID of the Verified Access groups. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters. Filter names and values are case-sensitive. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values.

nested_items.name: VerifiedAccessGroups
nested_items.description: Details about the Verified Access groups.

nested_items.name: VerifiedAccessGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Verified Access group.

nested_items.name: VerifiedAccessInstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services Verified Access instance.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description for the Amazon Web Services Verified Access group.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account number that owns the group.

nested_items.name: VerifiedAccessGroupArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Verified Access group.

nested_items.name: SseSpecification
nested_items.description: The options in use for server side encryption.

nested_items.name: CustomerManagedKeyEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether customer managed KMS keys are in use for server side encryption.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the KMS key.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
